channel.title: Multi barrage

item.title: Multi barrage
item.dc:creator: @dream21 dream21
item.description:
@dream21 wrote:

Does anyone know how to make my barrage multi? im on a delta 317. I can’t seem to get it correct. it barrages whole server sometimes when i try to fix it. I edit clickingmost and put:
case 51080:
c.autocastID = 12891;
c.attackPlayersWithin(369, 1, 2);
c.sendFrame246(329, 200, c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]);
c.setSidebarInterface(0, 328);
break;
and in client.java i add:
if (spell == 12891) {
attackPlayersWithin(369, 1, 2);
return false;
}
anyone know how i can make it so it doesn’t barrage whole server, and it attacks multiple ppl. I don’t want it attacking multiple npcs btw. thanks for all your help!

Read full topic
